code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import noteContext from'../context/noteContext';import"../style/Noteitem.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Noteitem=props=>{const{note,updateNote}=props;const context=useContext(noteContext);const{deleteNote}=context;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notes cold-md-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:note.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-trash-alt mx-2 ",onClick:()=>{deleteNote(note._id);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-edit mx-2",onClick:()=>{updateNote(note);}})]})})});};export default Noteitem;
